short_description: You know what we say — #NeverStopStartingUp. A new year is coming soon, and maybe that means you need to keep on pushing toward your health goals. We’re here to help. And so is Yoda.
long_description:
You know what we say — #NeverStopStartingUp. A new year is coming soon, and maybe that means you need to keep on pushing toward your health goals. Or maybe it means you’re finally ready to #LayDownTracks in a healthier direction and define a whole new you. Either way, we’re here to help.

And so is Yoda.

Well, his most famous words are at least.

The new SCH fitness center is here for you, complete with a plentiful amount of Yoda yoga mats for your SF yoga sessions.


You can borrow them, too. Many of our guests love to attend the beautiful and diverse yoga class at Grace Cathedral. Just check out a Yoda yoga mat at our front desk and you’re all set.

If you want some more Jedi inspiration, the Yoda fountain pictured above is just minutes away in Presidio National Park. The life-size statue stands just outside LucasFilm’s lobby, which you can also visit to see Star Wars memorabilia including a life-size Darth Vader.
